page.description: These templates can be used in the List control, the ViewBox control and in the Free-form HTML Container control.

section.title: Inserting a Template in a List Control

description.p: HTML Templates can only be used in a Freeform List layout. To insert one of the HTML Templates in a List control,
In the List Builder on the List Layout tab, place the mouse cursor in the layout editor where you would like to insert the template.
Click the *[ui:Pre-defined Templates]* link on the bottom left of the layout editor.
Click the *[ui:More Templates]* button at the bottom of the *[ui:List Template Picker]* window.
Select the desired HTML layout. Then click *[ui:OK]*.
Click *[ui:Cancel]* to exit without selecting a template.

section.title: Inserting a Template in a ViewBox Control

description.p: HTML Templates can only be inserted using the Freeform editor in the ViewBox.
In the ViewBox Builder on the ViewBox Layout tab, select the *[ui:Freeform Layout]* radio button.
Place the mouse cursor in the layout editor where you would like to insert the template.
Click the *[ui:Insert...]* button and select *[ui:Pre-defined Layout Template]* from the menu.
Click the *[ui:More Templates]* button at the bottom of the *[ui:List Template Picker]* window.
Select the desired HTML layout. Then click *[ui:OK]*.
Click *[ui:Cancel]* to exit without selecting a template.

section.title: Inserting a Template in a Free-form Layout Container

description.p: HTML Templates can be used in the *[ui:Free-form layout]* for the Free-form Layout Container.

tip.p: You can insert UX controls that are hidden (the control's *[ui:Hide]* property has been checked) into a Free-form Layout Container's layout.

description.p: Click the [...] smart field button for the *[ui:Free-form layout]* property to edit the layout.
Place the mouse cursor in the layout editor where you would like to insert the template.
Click the *[ui:Insert HTML Template]* link below the layout editor.
Select the desired HTML layout. Then click *[ui:OK]*.
Click *[ui:Cancel]* to exit without selecting a template.

videos.title: Using HTML Templates in the List, ViewBox and Free-form HTML Layout Control

description.p: The UX builder comes with several attractively designed HTML templates than can be used when designing List controls, ViewBox controls and Free-form HTML Layout controls. In this video, we show how to use the pre-defined HTML templates to create some very attractive UX components. The video shows how to insert an HTML Template into a List control, ViewBox control, and Freeform HTML Container Control.
